manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Truest Quality What makes us different is the promise of goodness that goes into every one of our supplements. We take high standards seriously, which is why we're the #1 most recommended professional supplement brand, ranked highest in quality and trust.^ ^Among professional supplement brands surveyed, Nutrition Business Journal 2016, 2020, 2023. Good from Start to Finish When developing our products, we work in close collaboration with leading medical professionals and nutritional experts to create premium dietary supplements that you can feel good about. Our high-quality ingredients are backed by science with many of our formulations being included in more than 50 product-specific clinical studies in leading peer-reviewed journals. FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Goodness at our Core Pure Encapsulations was built with the purest of hearts and a plan to improve the wellness and well-being of others. This heartfelt commitment now extends to the planet as we move forward in sustainability initiatives and continue to support incredible organizations dedicated to leading the charge for a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars METHYLATED AND ACTIVE FORMS OF ALL VITAMINS
reviews.reviewText: THIS IS AN ALL IN ONE! The name really does say it all. This formula contains all the bio active forms of vitamins and methylated B (which is critical for our body). No additional supplementation is needed. I am so impressed by the quality of these vitamins. I will never purchase another multi again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purely Essential Multivitamin
reviews.reviewText: I've been a loyal user of Pure Encapsulations for some time, having tried numerous brands throughout the years, and I can confidently say this brand stands out as the premier choice. The O.N.E. Multivitamin, in particular, has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. What sets it apart isn't just its comprehensive formula designed to enhance cognitive function, cellular health, and eye health; it's also the brand's commitment to purity. These capsules are free from the common allergens and superfluous additives prevalent in so many other supplements on the market. With Pure Encapsulations, it's not only about the beneficial ingredients they include but also about the harmful ones they exclude, ensuring that you're nourishing your body safely and effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only mutivitamin I've ever been able to take long term-- it's the best!!! Helpful info on smell in comment.
reviews.reviewText: This multivitamin was a game changer for me. I have spent hundreds of dollars over the years on everything from the common brands to expensive specialty vitamins from natural food stores, and all of them left me tasting and "feeling" the vitamins in an unpleasant way. I've used this brand for other supplements and know they're a great company, but I was still skeptical that their multivitamin would work for me. I don't have any of the issues with the O.N.E. Multivitamin like I did with other brands, and I've been taking this for over a year now (I think their formulation is better and easier on the body). I feel SO much better taking it, too! I truly think it's the best multivitamin you can buy. It seems pricey at first glance, but you're getting two months worth which makes it comparable to many others on the market. Size of the pill is better than others, too.Regarding the smell: Other comments have noted that there's a stinky smell to the pills. I called the company, both to find out what it was and to make sure this wasn't a counterfeit product (I know Amazon tries to regulate, but it still happens sometimes). The company was very kind and helpful! The smell comes from a bit of sulfur in one of the ingredients-- it is a tiny amount, but sulfur can be super stinky even in small quantities-- and it's not at all harmful in that trace amount. I forgot which ingredient, it took me a while to post this, sorry! I found taking the pill with food and/or a little milk helped mask the smell and I rarely ever notice it anymore. Also, the smell decreases over time, so perhaps letting a new bottle sit open in a cool, dry place for a day or two might help, too. If you have more questions/concerns, don't hesitate to call the company-- like I said, they're super friendly and happy to answer questions.FYI: if you need magnesium for muscle or other issues, that is NOT included in this formula. Pure Encapsulations does sell two other varieties, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and comprehensive
reviews.reviewText: This brand was recommended by my functional medicine physician, and this multi has much more than others I looked at. I saw many reviews saying it’s expensive, but it’s a 4 month supply bc you only take one daily! Great value IMO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far good
reviews.reviewText: Easy to swallow, but it does have an off putting smell. Make sure you drink plenty of water. This is a capsule, not a hard pill and it can upset your stomach if you don’t drink enough water. I purchased this pill because of the Metafolin and it contains CoQ10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good company reputation and a more complete multiple than many. Not cheap, but I keep coming back to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best New Multivitamin I've tried all year
reviews.reviewText: These are the best new multivitamin I've tried in years. After dealing with fatigue for the past few years it's been challenging completing daily tasks. Usually, I wake up with fatigue and that makes it difficult to get any work done. Since, taking these multivitamins (about 1mo) along with other supplements I have more energy than I've had in years. I don't wake up feeling fatigued as much and my energy levels have been increasing. I'm very thankful for Pure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are easy to swallow and have kept me healthy
Had been taking this high quality multivitamin for some time and good feedback
